ABOUT_ME.Title: About Me
ABOUT_ME.MainDescription: Hi, I'm a german Frontend Developer based in Hamburg. Motivated by the limitless opportunities of bulding software and creating innovative Technologies. My ecitment burns by visualizing the websites and applications i could be part of.
ABOUT_ME.DescriptionOne: Flexibale in terms of working environments, Im open to re-locate with support or bevorzugt work Remotely
ABOUT_ME.DescriptionTwo: Self-improvement is a big part of my life, I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow
ABOUT_ME.DescriptionThree: A journey where ideas take shape and challenges unveil hidden opportunities—this is where the magic of programming begins. With every line I write, my mission is to bridge the gap between vision and reality, crafting solutions that don’t just work but inspire and empower. Let’s transform challenges into opportunities and dreams into digital masterpieces.

SKILL_SET.Title: My Skills
SKILL_SET.Content: This is the skill set section.
SKILL_SET.ContentTwo: Feel free to contact me. i look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge

FEATURED_PROJECTS.Title: Featured Projects
FEATURED_PROJECTS.Description: Explore a selection of my most recent and notable projects.

Overlay.Title: What is this project about?
Overlay.DescriptionOne: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
Overlay.DescriptionTwo: Jump and run game based on object-oriented approach. Help pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
Overlay.DescriptionThree: Pokedex is an index of all Pokemons existing. it uses the official Pokemon API. You will find all detail for your favorite Pokemon through one click

CONTACT_ME.Title: Let's work together
CONTACT_ME.Description: Contact me through this form, i am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your project with my work.
